title: 2 years in a row I get chat restricted at the end of the season, sigh.
body:
Last year, I got chat restricted for 10 games, right about the end of the season. (Was level 4 honor)

This year got another chat restriction 1 month before season ended. (Was in middle of level 2 honor)

I am starting to think I'm cursed lol. Literally not even a single moderation throughout the year yet I ALWAYS get hammered the last few days of ranked. So disappointing. x(

_**Press F to pay respects**_

replies.body:
You probably were getting on edge more close to the end of the season cos your goals were so close. 

More on edge = less restraint on yourself

Seeing bad plays = Rile up your emotions

Less restraint + Riled up emotions = more likely to flame

More likely to flame = higher chance to get punished.

Not gonna lie, I still believe in my claims and expected them to get banned but hey who am I to call people boosted, I mean I'm just an asshole, trash jungler, useless player according to them. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

There was a second game too but even Riot themself said it was strange since all I said was "report (X) player" however they concluded it is considered harassment(the player was trolling and inting intentionally), but hey who cares; better moderate people who are actually trying to win for saying to report a Troller than the trollers themselves, am I right? :DDD

Not exactly true. A chat restriction is like 95% automated.

And I have an e-mail somewhere from Riot, when asking them about a chat restriction where I asked the players to report someone inting down mid, where I was explicitly told the only reason I received a restriction was because "asking other players to report someone creates a negative game environment".

Fact is that Riot doesn't go through reports one by one and determine punishments. Punishments are automated based on feedback from other players. Only if they are repeat offenders, or if they request an appeal, will a human actually get involved.

Oh you gonna take this stance instead?

Then let's cut to the chase and chatlogs or shut up.
